hadiths.text: Narrated Wa'il ibn Hujr: I saw that the Prophet (ﷺ) placed his knees (on the ground) before placing his hands when he prostrated himself. And when he stood up, he raised his hands before his knees

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ يَضَعُ رُكْبَتَيْهِ قَبْلَ يَدَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: How Should One Place His Knees Before His Hands (While Going Into Prostration)
